description: this is the identifier for the start of the AERACK01 UDP packet
the length of the packet (not including all characters up-to the comma which follows this number)
the valid time for this packet (usually 1 second behind actual time)
indication of whether the CRIO is successfully synchronised to PTP time ( 1 = synced, 0 = not-synced )
the internal hardware temperature of the CRIO
indicates the flight number for this packet ( an "empty" string here indicates that the CRIO hasn't been assigned a flight number )
indicates whether the FPGA code is running ( a value toggling e.g. 1-0-1-0…etc shows running code, fixed value = non running )
indicates whether the realtime code is running ( a value toggling e.g. 1-0-1-0…etc shows running code, fixed value = non running )
- currently unused but for future use (boolean, therefore 0,1 )
this number starts @ zero and increments with each UDP packet - used for verification of packet stream
- currently unused but for future use ( text, max string size = 6 characters )
- currently unused but for future use ( text, max string size = 6 characters )
- currently unused but for future use ( text, max string size = 6 characters )
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the filter 1 flow transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the filter 1 pressure transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the filter 2 flow transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the filter 2 pressure transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the psap flow transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the psap linear transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the psap logarithmic transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the psap transmission
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total blue output
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total green output
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total red output
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer pressure transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer temperature transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer backscatter blue output
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total backscatter green output
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer total backscatter red output
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer humidity transducer
the raw reading (in counts) taken from the nephelometer status output
padding cell 1 (always has value 0)
padding cell 2 (always has value 0)
the text string reading to represent the buck mirror temperature
the text string reading to represent the buck status output
the text string reading to represent the buck pressure transducer
the text string reading to represent the buck coldfinger temperature
the text string reading to represent the buck balance output
the text string reading to represent the buck mirror flag
the text string reading to represent the buck board temperature reading
